response.overview: Eddie Silverton (Tony Streeter), an auditor working in a coastal Victorian manor, begins experiencing recurring, unsettling dreams that he believes are echoes of a past life. His growing obsession with these visions and a mysterious man within them leads to emotional distance from his wife Denise (Sarah Bull), who suspects he’s struggling with his sexuality. As Eddie's grasp on reality weakens, the dreams steer him toward a tragic revelation and the literal edge of sanity—where haunting memories resurface in the cries of the seagulls.
response.title: Where Seagulls Cry a Song
